settings.name: Prefix
settings.description: The prefix before commands that this server will use for all commands.

settings.name: Currency Code
settings.description: The currency the server shop will use.
settings.expected_value: A currency code. For a full list of supported currency codes, see https://developer.paypal.com/docs/api/reference/currency-codes/

settings.name: Payment User Webhook
settings.description: The Discord WebHook URL which will inform users when their payment is accepted or refunded.

settings.name: Payment Admin Webhook
settings.description: The Discord WebHook URL which inform admins when a payment is accepted or refunded.
